DocAttribute.Name: Mountable
DocAttribute.Documentation: Specifies whether the kerb can be readily climbed by a vehicle or not.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either there is no member type object associated, i.e. the _IsTypedBy_ inverse relationship is not provided, or the associated type object has to be of type _IfcKerbType_.
